arabicText: قَدْ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوْلَ ٱلَّتِى تُجَـٰدِلُكَ فِى زَوْجِهَا وَتَشْتَكِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ يَسْمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَآ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	indeed	heard	the	speech	of	the	
woman	who	is	arguing	with	you	(O	dear	
Prophet	Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him)	concerning	her	husband,	
and	is	complaining	to	Allah;	and	Allah	
hears	the	conversation	of	you	both;	
indeed	Allah	is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		Allah	ne	suni	uski	bāt	jo	tum	se	
apne	shauhar	ke	mu'āmle	meiñ	bahes	
karti	hai	aur	Allah	se	shikāyat	karti	hai	
aur	Allah	tum	donoñ	ki	guftagu	sun	rahā	
hai	be-shak		Allah	sunta	dekhta	hai

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يُظَـٰهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَآئِهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَـٰتِهِمْ ۖ إِنْ أُمَّهَـٰتُهُمْ إِلَّا ٱلَّـٰٓـِٔى وَلَدْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَزُورًۭا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Those	among	you	who	have	proclaimed	
their	wives	as	their	mothers	–	so	their	
wives	are	not	their	mothers;	their	
mothers	are	only	those	that	gave	them	
birth;	and	undoubtedly	they	utter	evil	and	
a	blatant	lie;	and	indeed	Allah	is	Most	
Pardoning,	Oft	Forgiving.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	tum	meiñ	apni	bibiyoñ	ko	apni	mā	
ki	jagah	keh	baithte	haiñ	woh	unki	
māayeñ	nahi	unki	māayeñ	to	wohi	haiñ	jin	
se	woh	paida	haiñ	aur	woh	be-shak		buri	
aur	niri	jhoot	bāt	kehte	haiñ	aur	be-shak	
Allah	zaroor	mu'āf	karne	wāla	aur	bakhsh	
ne	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُظَـٰهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمْ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُوا۟ فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِۦ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	among	you	who	have	
proclaimed	their	wives	as	their	mothers	
and	then	wish	to	revert	to	the	matter	
upon	which	they	had	uttered	such	an	
enormous	word,	must	then	free	a	slave	
before	they	touch	one	another;	this	is	
what	you	are	advised;	and	Allah	is	Aware	
of	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	apni	bibiyon	ko	apni	mā	ki	
jagah	kaheiñ	phir	wohi	karna	chāheñ	jis	
par	itni	badi	bāt	keh	chuke	to	un	par	lāzim	
hai	ek	barda	(Ghulām)	azād	karna	qabl	
iske	ke	ek	doosre	ko	hāth	lagayeñ	yeh	hai	
jo	nasihat	tumheiñ	ki	jāti	hai	aur	Allah	
tumhāre	kāmoñ	se	khabar-dār	hai

arabicText: فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّا ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَإِطْعَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسْكِينًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَلِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
So	one	who	cannot	find	a	slave,	must	then	
fast	for	two	successive	months	before	
they	touch	one	another;	and	one	who	
cannot	even	fast,	must	then	feed	sixty	needy	ones;	this	is	in	order	that	you	keep	faith	in	Allah	
and	His	Noble	Messenger;	and	these	are	the	limits	of	Allah;	and	for	the	disbelievers	is	a	painful	
punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jise	barda	(Ghulām)	na	mile	to	
lagatār	do	(2)	mahine	ke	Roze	qabl	iske	ke	
ek	doosre	ko	hāth	lagāayeñ	phir	jis	se	
Roze	bhi	na	ho	sakeñ	to	sāt	(7)	miskeenoñ	
ka	pet	bharna	yeh	is	liye	ke	tum	Allah	aur	
uske	Rasool	par	Imān	rakho	aur	yeh	Allah	ki	hadeiñ	haiñ	aur	kāfiroñ		ke	liye	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ كُبِتُوا۟ كَمَا كُبِتَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ وَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ ۚ وَلِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	oppose	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger	have	been	humiliated,	like	those	
before	them	who	were	humiliated,	and	We	have	indeed	sent	down	clear	verses;	and	for	the	
disbelievers	is	a	disgraceful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		woh	jo	mukhalifat	karte	haiñ	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	ki	zaleel	kiye	gaye	jaise	un	se	agloñ	
ko	zillat	di	gayi	aur	be-shak		hum	ne	raushan	āayateiñ	utāriñ	aur	kāfiroñ		ke	liye	khwāri	ka	‘aƶāb		
hai.

arabicText: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًۭا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓا۟ ۚ أَحْصَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
englishTranslationText:
The	day	when	Allah	will	raise	all	of	them	together	and	inform	them	of	their	misdeeds;	Allah	has	
kept	count	of	them,	whereas	they	have	forgotten	them;	and	all	things	are	present	before	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	Allah	un	sab	ko	uthayega	phir	unheiñ	unke	kotak	(Kartoot)	jatā	dega	Allah	ne	unheiñ	gin	
rakha	hai	aur	woh	bhool	gaye	aur	har	cheez	Allah	ke	sāmne	hai

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ مَا يَكُونُ مِن نَّجْوَىٰ ثَلَـٰثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمْ وَلَا خَمْسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمْ وَلَآ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكْثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ ۖ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
O	listener!	Did	you	not	see	that	Allah	
knows	all	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	
all	whatever	is	in	the	earth?	Wherever	
there	is	any	discussion	among	three	He	is	
the	fourth	present	with	them,	and	among	
five	He	is	the	sixth,	and	there	is	no	
discussion	among	fewer	or	more	except	
that	He	is	with	them	wherever	they	may	
be;	and	then	on	the	Day	of	Resurrection	
He	will	inform	them	of	all	what	they	did;	
indeed	Allah	knows	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	sunne	wāle	Kya	tu	ne	na	dekha	ke	
Allah	jānta	hai	jo	kuchh	āasmānoñ	meiñ	
hai	aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	jahāñ	kahiñ	
teen	shakhsoñ	ki	sargoshi	ho	to	chautha	
woh	maujood	hai	aur	pāñch	ki	to	chhata	
woh	aur	na	is	se	kam	aur	na	is	se	ziyada	ki	
magar	yeh	ke	woh	unke	sāth	hai	jahāñ	
kahiñ	hoñ	phir	unheiñ	qiyamat	ke	din	
batā	dega	jo	kuchh	unhoñ	ne	kiya	be-shak		
Allah	sab	kuchh	jānta	hai.

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نُهُوا۟ عَنِ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَيَتَنَـٰجَوْنَ بِٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَإِذَا جَآءُوكَ حَيَّوْكَ بِمَا لَمْ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ وَيَقُولُونَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَوْلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا ٱللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُ ۚ حَسْبُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ يَصْلَوْنَهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
Did	you	not	see	those	who	were	forbidden	
from	conspiracy,	yet	they	do	what	was	
forbidden,	and	consult	each	other	for	
sinning,	and	for	exceeding	limits,	and	for	
disobeying	the	Noble	Messenger?	And	
when	they	come	in	your	presence,	they	
greet	you	with	words	not	chosen	by	Allah	
for	respectfully	greeting	you,	and	they	
inwardly	say,	“Why	does	not	Allah	punish	
us	for	what	we	say?”;	hell	is	sufficient	for	
them;	they	will	sink	into	it;	and	what	a	
wretched	outcome!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekha	jinheiñ	buri	
mashwarat	(mushāwarat)	se	mana’	
farmāya	gaya	tha	phir	wohi	karte	haiñ	
jiski	mumani'at	huyi	thi	aur	āapas		meiñ	
gunah	aur	had	se	badhne	aur	Rasool	ki	na
farmāni	ke	mashware	karte	haiñ	aur	jab	
tumhāre	huzoor	hāzir	hote	haiñ	to	un	
lafzoñ	se	tumheiñ		mujra	(Salām)	karte	
haiñ	jo	lafz	Allah	ne	tumhāre	a’ezāz	meiñ	
na	kahe	aur	apne	diloñ		meiñ	kehte	haiñ	
hameiñ	Allah	‘aƶāb	kyuñ	nahi	karta	
hamāre	is	kehne	par	unheiñ	Jahannam	bas	
(Kāfi)	hai	us	meiñ	dhanseñ	ge	to	kya	hi	
bura	anjām.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا تَنَـٰجَيْتُمْ فَلَا تَتَنَـٰجَوْا۟ بِٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَتَنَـٰجَوْا۟ بِٱلْبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقْوَىٰ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	When	you	consult	
each	other,	do	not	consult	for	sinning,	nor	
for	exceeding	limits,	nor	for	disobeying	
the	Noble	Messenger	-	and	consult	for	
righteousness	and	piety;	and	fear	Allah,	
towards	Whom	you	will	be	raised.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Tum	jab	āapas	meiñ	
mashwarat	karo	to	gunah	aur	had	se	
badhne	aur	Rasool	ki	na	farmāni	ki	
mashwarat	na	karo	aur	neki	aur	parhez
gāri	ki	mashwarat	karo	aur	Allah	se	daro	
jiski	taraf	uthaye	jāoge.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ لِيَحْزُنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَيْسَ بِضَآرِّهِمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	evil	consultation	is	only	from	the	
devil	in	order	that	he	may	upset	the	
believers,	whereas	he	cannot	harm	them	in	the	least	without	Allah’s	command;	and	only	upon	
Allah	must	the	Muslims	rely.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	mashwarat	to	shaitān	hi	ki	taraf	se	
hai	is	liye	ke	Imān	wāloñ	ko	ranj	de	aur	woh	unka	kuchh	nahi	bigād	sakta	be-hukm-e-khuda	ke	
aur	Musalmanoñ	ko	Allah	hi	par	bharosa	chahiye

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمْ تَفَسَّحُوا۟ فِى ٱلْمَجَـٰلِسِ فَٱفْسَحُوا۟ يَفْسَحِ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا قِيلَ ٱنشُزُوا۟ فَٱنشُزُوا۟ يَرْفَعِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ دَرَجَـٰتٍۢ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	When	you	are	told	to	give	room	in	the	assemblies,	then	do	give	room	-	
Allah	will	give	you	room	(in	His	mercy);	and	when	it	is	said,	“Stand	up	in	reverence”,	then	do	
stand	up	-	Allah	will	raise	the	believers	among	you,	and	those	given	knowledge,	to	high	ranks;	
and	Allah	is	Aware	of	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Jab	tum	se	kahā	jāye	majlisoñ	meiñ	jagah	do	to	jagah	do	Allah	tumheiñ	jagah	
dega	aur	jab	kahā	jāye	uth	khade	ho	to	uth	khade	ho	Allah	tumhāre	Imān	waloñ	ke	aur	unke	
jinko	‘Ilm	diya	gaya	daraje	buland	farmāyega	aur	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	ki	khabar	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نَـٰجَيْتُمُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ نَجْوَىٰكُمْ صَدَقَةًۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	When	you	wish	to	
humbly	consult	with	the	Noble	
Messenger,	give	some	charity	before	you	
consult;	that	is	much	better	and	much	
purer	for	you;	so	if	you	do	not	have	the	
means,	then	(know	that)	Allah	is	Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Jab	tum	Rasool	se	koi	bāt	
āahista	‘arz	karna	chāho	to	apni	‘arz	se	
pehle	kuchh	sadqa	de	lo	yeh	tumhāre	liye	
behtar	aur	bahut	suthra	hai	phir	agar	
tumheiñ	maqdoor	na	ho	to	Allah	bakhsh	
ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: ءَأَشْفَقْتُمْ أَن تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىْ نَجْوَىٰكُمْ صَدَقَـٰتٍۢ ۚ فَإِذْ لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ وَتَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Were	you	afraid	to	offer	charity	before	
you	consult?	So	when	you	did	not	do	this,	
and	Allah	has	inclined	towards	you	with	
His	mercy,	keep	the	prayers	established	
and	pay	the	obligatory	charity	and	obey	
Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger;	and	Allah	
is	Aware	of	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tum	is	se	dare	ke	tum	apni	‘arz	se	
pehle	kuchh	sadqe	do	phir	jab	tum	ne	yeh	
na	kiya	aur	Allah	ne	apni	mehar	se	tum	
par	ruju’	farmayi	to	Namāz	qāim	rakho	
aur	Zakāt	do	aur	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	ke	
farmāñ	bardār	raho	aur	Allah	tumhāre	
kāmoñ	ko	jānta	hai.

arabicText: ۞ أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوْا۟ قَوْمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَا مِنْهُمْ وَيَحْلِفُونَ عَلَى ٱلْكَذِبِ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Did	you	not	see	those	who	befriended	
those	upon	whom	is	Allah’s	wrath?	They	
are	neither	of	you	nor	of	these	-	and	they	
swear	a	false	oath,	whereas	they	know
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekha	jo	aisoñ	ke	
dost	huwe	jin	par	Allah	ka	ghazab	hai	woh	
na	tum	meiñ	se	na	un	meiñ	se	woh	dānista	
jhooti	qasam	khāte	haiñ.

arabicText: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	kept	prepared	a	severe	
punishment	for	them;	indeed	they	commit	
extremely	evil	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	unke	liye	sakht	‘aƶāb	tayyār	kar	
rakha	hai	be-shak		woh	bahut	hi	bure	kām	
karte	haiñ.

arabicText: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ جُنَّةًۭ فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
They	use	their	oaths	as	a	shield	therefore	
preventing	from	Allah’s	way	-	so	for	them	
is	a	disgraceful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unhoñ	ne	apni	qasamoñ	ko	dhāl	banā	liya	
hai	to	Allah	ki	rāh	se	roka	to	unke	liye	
khwāri	ka	‘aƶāb		hai.

arabicText: لَّن تُغْنِىَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Their	wealth	and	their	children	will	be	of	
no	use	to	them	before	Allah;	they	are	the	
people	of	hell;	they	are	to	remain	in	it	
forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke	māl	aur	unki	aulād	Allah	ke	sāmne	
unheiñ	kuchh	kām	na	deñge	woh	dozakhi	
haiñ	unheiñ	us	meiñ	hamesha	rehna.

arabicText: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًۭا فَيَحْلِفُونَ لَهُۥ كَمَا يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	day	when	Allah	will	raise	them	all,	
they	will	swear	in	His	presence	the	way	they	now	swear	in	front	of	you,	and	they	will	assume	
that	they	have	achieved	something;	pay	heed!	Indeed	it	is	they	who	are	the	liars.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	Allah	un	sab	ko	uthaye	ga	to	uske	
huzoor	bhi	aise	hi	qasameiñ	khayeñ	ge	
jaisi	tumhāre	sāmne	kha	rahe	haiñ	aur	
woh	yeh	samajhte	haiñ	ke	Unhoñ	ne	kuchh	kiya	sunte	ho	be-shak		wohi	jhoote	haiñ.

arabicText: ٱسْتَحْوَذَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَأَنسَىٰهُمْ ذِكْرَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حِزْبُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزْبَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	devil	has	overpowered	them,	so	they	forgot	the	remembrance	of	Allah;	they	are	the	devil’s	
group;	pay	heed!	Indeed	it	is	the	devil’s	group	who	are	the	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	par	shaitān	ghalib	āa	gaya	to	unheiñ	Allah	ki	yād	bhula	di	woh	shaitān	ke	giroh	haiñ	sunta	
hai	be-shak		shaitān	hi	ka	giroh	hār	meiñ	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ٱلْأَذَلِّينَ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	those	who	oppose	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger,	are	among	the	most	despicable.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		woh	jo	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	ki	mukhalifat	karte	haiñ	woh	sab	se	ziyada	zaleeloñ	meiñ	
haiñ.

arabicText: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغْلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	already	decreed	that,	“I	will	indeed	be	victorious,	and	My	Noble	Messengers”;	indeed	
Allah	is	Almighty,	the	Most	Honourable.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	likh	chuka	ke	zaroor	maiñ	ghalib	āaoñga	aur	mere	Rasool	be-shak	Allah	quwwat	wāla	
‘izzat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوْمًۭا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ يُوَآدُّونَ مَنْ حَآدَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَوْ كَانُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ أَوْ أَبْنَآءَهُمْ أَوْ إِخْوَٰنَهُمْ أَوْ عَشِيرَتَهُمْ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ كَتَبَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ وَأَيَّدَهُم بِرُوحٍۢ مِّنْهُ ۖ وَيُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ رَضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حِزْبُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزْبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
You	will	not	find	the	people	who	believe	
in	Allah	and	the	Last	Day,	befriending	
those	who	oppose	Allah	and	His	Noble	
Messenger,	even	if	they	are	their	fathers	
or	their	sons	or	their	brothers	or	their	
tribesmen;	it	is	these	upon	whose	hearts	
Allah	has	ingrained	faith,	and	has	aided	
them	with	a	Spirit	from	Himself;	and	He	
will	admit	them	into	Gardens	beneath	
which	rivers	flow,	abiding	in	them	
forever;	Allah	is	pleased	with	them,	and	
they	are	pleased	with	Him;	this	is	Allah’s	
group;	pay	heed!	Indeed	it	is	Allah’s	group	
who	are	the	successful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	na	pāoge	un	logoñ	ko	jo	yaqeen	
rakhte	haiñ	Allah	aur	pichhle	din	par	ke	
dosti	kareñ	un	se	jinhoñ	ne	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	se	mukhalifat	ki	agarche	woh	unke	
bāp	ya	bete	ya	bhai	ya	kunbe	wāle	hoñ	
yeh	haiñ	jinke	diloñ	meiñ	Allah	ne	imān	
naqsh	farmā	diya	aur	apni	taraf	ki	rooh	se	
unki	madad	ki	aur	unheiñ	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	
jāye	ga	jinke	neeche	nehreiñ	baheñ	un	
meiñ	hamesha	raheñ	Allah	un	se	rāzi	aur	
woh	Allah	se	rāzi	yeh	Allah	ki	jamā’at	hai	
sunta	hai	Allah	hi	ki	jamā’at	kāmyāb	hai.

arabicText: لَّسَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
All	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	all	
whatever	is	in	the	earth	proclaims	the	
Purity	of	Allah;	and	He	only	is	the	Most	
Honourable,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	pāki	bolta	hai	jo	kuch	āasmānoñ	
meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	aur	
wohi	Ízzat-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِمْ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلْحَشْرِ ۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ ۖ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمْ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَمْ يَحْتَسِبُوا۟ ۖ وَقَذَفَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعْبَ ۚ يُخْرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَيْدِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فَٱعْتَبِرُوا۟ يَـٰٓأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	expelled	the	disbelievers	
among	the	People	given	the	Book(s)	from	
their	homes,	for	their	first	gathering;	you	
did	not	expect	them	to	leave,	whereas	
they	assumed	that	their	fortresses	would	
save	them	from	Allah,	so	Allah’s	command	
came	to	them	from	a	place	they	had	not	
imagined;	and	He	instilled	awe	in	their	
hearts,	so	they	ruin	their	own	houses	by	
their	own	hands	and	at	the	hands	of	the	
Muslims;	therefore	learn	a	lesson,	O	those	who	can	perceive!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	un	kāfir	kitābiyoñ	ko	unke	
gharoñ	se	nikāla	unke	pehle	hashr	ke	liye	
tumheiñ	gumān	na	tha	ke	woh	nikleñge	
aur	woh	samajhte	they	ke	unke	qile	
unheiñ	Allah	se	bacha	leñge	to	Allah	ka	
ḥukm	unke	pās	āaya	jahāñ	se	unka	
gumān	bhi	na	tha	aur	us	ne	unke	diloñ		
meiñ	ru'ab	dāla	ke	apne	ghar	wirān	karte	
haiñ	apne	hāthoñ	aur	Musalmanoñ	ke	
hāthoñ	to	ibrat	lo	aey	nigah	wālo.

arabicText: وَلَوْلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	Allah	not	decreed	exile	for	them,	He	would	have	surely	punished	them	in	this	world;	
and	for	them	in	the	Hereafter	is	the	punishment	of	the	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	na	hota	ke	Allah	ne	un	par	ghar	se	ujadna	likh	diya	tha	to	duniya	hi	meiñ	un	par	‘aƶāb		
farmāta	aur	unke	liye	Ākhirat	meiñ	āag	ka	‘aƶāb	hai.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ شَآقُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	they	remained	opposed	to	
Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger;	and	
whoever	remains	opposed	to	Allah,	(and	
His	Noble	Messenger)	-	then	indeed	Allah’s	
punishment	is	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	woh	Allah	se	aur	uske	
Rasool	se	phate	rahe	aur	jo	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	se	phatā	rahe	to	be-shak	Allah	ka	
áƶāb	sakht	hai.

arabicText: مَا قَطَعْتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوْ تَرَكْتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخْزِىَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	trees	you	had	cut	down	or	left	
standing	on	their	roots	was	all	by	Allah’s	
permission,	and	in	order	to	disgrace	the	
sinners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	darakht	tum	ne	kāte	ya	unki	jadoñ	par	
qāim	chord	diye	yeh	sab	Allah	ki	ijāzat	se	
tha	aur	is	liye	ke	fāsiqoñ	ko	ruswa	kare

arabicText: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَوْجَفْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ خَيْلٍۢ وَلَا رِكَابٍۢ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	from	them,	the	booty	which	Allah	
gave	to	His	Noble	Messenger	–	so	you	had	
not	raced	your	horses	or	camels	against	
them,	but	it	is	Allah	Who	gives	whomever	
He	wills	within	the	control	of	His	Noble	
Messengers;	and	Allah	is	Able	to	do	all	
things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	ghanimat	dilayi	Allah	ne	apne	
Rasool	ko	un	se	to	tum	ne	un	par	na	apne	
ghode	daudāye	they	aur	na	ooñt	hāñ	Allah	
apne	Rasooloñ	ke	qābu	meiñ	de	deta	hai	
jise	chāhe	aur	Allah	sab	kuchh	kar	sakta	
hai

arabicText: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ كَىْ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةًۢ بَيْنَ ٱلْأَغْنِيَآءِ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمْ عَنْهُ فَٱنتَهُوا۟ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
The	booty	which	Allah	gave	to	His	Noble	
Messenger	from	the	people	of	the	
townships,	is	for	Allah	and	His	Noble	
Messenger,	and	for	the	relatives,	and	the	
orphans,	and	the	needy	and	the	travellers	–	so	that	it	does	not	become	the	wealth	of	
the	rich	among	you;	and	accept	whatever	
the	Noble	Messenger	gives	you;	and	
refrain	from	whatever	he	forbids	you;	and	
fear	Allah;	indeed	Allah’s	punishment	is	
severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	ghanimat	dilayi	Allah	ne	apne	Rasool	ko	
shaher	waloñ	se	woh	Allah	aur	Rasool	ki	
hai	aur	rishte	dāroñ	aur	yateemoñ	aur	
miskeenoñ	aur	musāfiroñ	ke	liye	ke	
tumhāre	aghniya	ka	māl	na	ho	jāye	aur	jo	
kuchh	tumheiñ	Rasool	‘aṭa	farmāyeñ	woh	
lo	aur	jis	se	mana’	farmāyeñ	b’az	raho	aur	
Allah	se	daro	be-shak	Allah	ka	‘aƶāb	sakht	
hai

arabicText: لِلْفُقَرَآءِ ٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِمْ وَأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًۭا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	(the	booty	is)	also	for	the	poor	
migrants	who	were	expelled	from	their	
homes	and	their	wealth,	seeking	Allah’s	munificence	and	His	pleasure,	and	aiding	Allah	and	His	
Noble	Messenger;	it	is	they	who	are	the	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	faqeer	hijrat	karne	waloñ		ke	liye	jo	
apne	gharoñ	aur	māloñ	se	nikāle	gaye	
Allah	ka	fazl	aur	uski	riza	chāhte	aur	
Allah-wa-Rasool	ki	madad	karte	wohi	sachche	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ يُحِبُّونَ مَنْ هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِى صُدُورِهِمْ حَاجَةًۭ مِّمَّآ أُوتُوا۟ وَيُؤْثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَوْ كَانَ بِهِمْ خَصَاصَةٌۭ ۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ ٩
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	accepted	this	city	as	their	home	and	accepted	faith	before	them,	befriend	those	
who	migrated	towards	them,	and	in	their	breasts	do	not	find	any	need	for	what	they	have	been	
given,	and	prefer	the	migrants	above	themselves	even	if	they	themselves	are	in	dire	need;	and	
whoever	is	saved	from	the	greed	of	his	soul	–	it	is	they	who	are	the	successful.
romanUrduTranslationText:

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ فِى قُلُوبِنَا غِلًّۭا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	came	after	them	say,	“O	
our	Lord!	Forgive	us,	and	our	brothers	
who	accepted	faith	before	us,	and	do	not	
keep	any	malice	in	our	hearts	towards	the	
believers	–	O	our	Lord!	Indeed	You	only	
are	the	Most	Compassionate,	Most	
Merciful.”

taraf	se	keena	na	rakh	aey	Rab	hamāre	
Be-shak	tu	hi	nihayat	maherbān	rahem
